summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sunnyside Avenue from North 77th Street to North 82nd Street; by constructing watermains together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8746 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
